title: Registered Business Locations - San Francisco
description: SUMMARY This dataset includes the locations of businesses that pay taxes to the City and County of San Francisco. Each registered business may have multiple locations and each location is a single row. The Treasurer & Tax Collector’s Office collects this data through business registration applications, account update/closure forms, and taxpayer filings. Business locations marked as “Administratively Closed” have not filed or communicated with TTX for 3 years, or were marked as closed following a notification from another City and County Department. The data is collected to help enforce the Business and Tax Regulations Code including, but not limited to: Article 6, Article 12, Article 12-A, and Article 12-A-1. http://sftreasurer.org/registration. To learn more about using this dataset watch this video. To update your listing or look up your BAN see this FAQ: Registered Business Locations Explainer

columns.name: UniqueID
columns.description: Unique formula: @Value(ttxid)-@Value(certificate_number)

columns.name: Location Id
columns.description: Location identifier

columns.name: Business Account Number
columns.description: Seven digit number assigned to registered business accounts

columns.name: Ownership Name
columns.description: Business owner(s) name

columns.name: DBA Name
columns.description: Doing Business As Name or Location Name

columns.name: Street Address
columns.description: Business location street address

columns.name: City
columns.description: Business location city

columns.name: State
columns.description: Business location state

columns.name: Source Zipcode
columns.description: Business location zip code

columns.name: Business Start Date
columns.description: Start date of the business

columns.name: Business End Date
columns.description: End date of the business

columns.name: Location Start Date
columns.description: Start date at the location

columns.name: Location End Date
columns.description: End date at the location, if closed

columns.name: Administratively Closed
columns.description: Business locations marked as “Administratively Closed” have not filed or communicated with TTX for 3 years, or were marked as closed following a notification from another City and County Department.

columns.name: Mail Address
columns.description: Address for mailing

columns.name: Mail City
columns.description: Mailing address city

columns.name: Mail Zipcode
columns.description: Mailing address zipcode

columns.name: Mail State
columns.description: Mailing address state

columns.name: NAICS Code
columns.description:
The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) is a standard used by Federal statistical agencies for the purpose of collecting, analyzing and publishing statistical data related to the U.S. business economy. A subset of these are options on the business registration form used in the administration of the City and County's tax code. The registrant indicates the business activity on the City and County's tax registration forms.

See NAICS Codes tab in the attached data dictionary under About > Attachments.

columns.name: NAICS Code Description
columns.description: The Business Activity that the NAICS code maps on to ("Multiple" if there are multiple codes indicated for the business).

columns.name: NAICS Code Descriptions List
columns.description: A list of all NAICS code descriptions separated by semi-colon

columns.name: Parking Tax
columns.description: Whether or not this business pays the parking tax

columns.name: Transient Occupancy Tax
columns.description: Whether or not this business pays the transient occupancy tax

columns.name: LIC Code
columns.description: The LIC code of the business, if multiple, separated by spaces

columns.name: LIC Code Description
columns.description: The LIC code description ("Multiple" if there are multiple codes for a business)

columns.name: LIC Code Descriptions List
columns.description: A list of all LIC code descriptions separated by semi-colon

columns.name: Supervisor District
columns.description:
The Supervisor District in which the business location falls. Not applicable outside of San Francisco.

Boundary reference: https://data.sfgov.org/d/xz9b-wyfc

columns.name: Neighborhoods - Analysis Boundaries
columns.description:
The Analysis Neighborhood in which the business location falls. Not applicable outside of San Francisco.

Boundary reference: https://data.sfgov.org/d/p5b7-5n3h

columns.name: Business Corridor
columns.description:
The Business Corridor in which the the business location falls, if it is in one. Not all business locations are in a corridor.

Boundary reference: https://data.sfgov.org/d/h7xa-2xwk

columns.name: Business Location
columns.description: The latitude and longitude of the business location for mapping purposes.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp the data was updated in the source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was loaded here (open data portal)

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Police Districts' (qgnn-b9vv) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Analysis Neighborhoods' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods' (jwn9-ihcz) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
